metadata.title: CVE-2021-4070 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Off-by-one Error in GitHub repository v2fly/v2ray-core prior to 4.44.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

v2ray - 4.34.0-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-v2ray-core package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.34.0-7').
